title: Broken Empire
description: Truths will be uncovered. Alliances will shift.Nothing will ever be the same.The four boys who stole my heart and then broke it are determined to win back my trust.Whether or not I'm ready to give it, I'll need them by my side.Because as it turns out, there are worse dangers in this world than the Princes of Oak Park Prep.And I can't fight this battle alone.
author: Callie Rose
